item.title: Migration notes
item.description: mach-core: v0.2 API redesign Mach v0.2 brought a complete redesign of the mach-core API. To upgrade your application, see the notes below. See also the migration notes page. Updating your application Previously, a complete Mach Core application looked something like this: pub const App = @This(); pub fn init(app: *App, core: *mach.Core) !void { // ... } pub fn deinit(_: *App, _: *mach.Core) void {} pub fn update(app: *App, core: *mach.
